page.title: 04W.Southampton, Hospital 2.
page.content:
{Princess Anne Hospital - Care.
There are 14 incubators at the Princess Anne.Most babies arrive at night.When babies have just been born they give them glucose and other liquids but sometimes they dont give them anything.The mother can eat what she likes after giving birth but that's usually cups of tea and toast.They opened the Princess Anne as a separate hospital to the General Hospital because it was too old,too small and in the way .One of the most needed pieces of machinery is one to give oxegen to patients when they need it. The Princess Anne covers all of Southampton,to Swanick,West End, Chandlers Ford and Ringwood.
